    • Uses of Composite in org.apache.cassandra.db.composites

      Subinterfaces of Composite in org.apache.cassandra.db.composites 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CellName
      A CellName is a Composite, but for which, for the sake of CQL3, we distinguish different parts: a CellName has first a number of clustering components, followed by the CQL3 column name, and then possibly followed by a collection element part.
      Classes in org.apache.cassandra.db.composites that implement Composite
